hello,
i know its irrelevant question, but i just wanna ask if its possible to "emulate" or run a sparc OS on intel or linux platform? i have a sparc executable image, that i really need to run and test under intel/linux. google says it might possible under qemu, but i want to know your opinion about this, with all your torrent, it seems like you're knowledgable on solaris plaform. thanks in advanced mate!
